description: Caere (also known as Cisra or Cerveteri) was a major Etruscan polis located ca. 50 km north-northwest of Rome in southern Etruria.

properties.description: A complex of civic and sacred buildings in the urban area of ancient Caere, including the so-called "elliptical building". Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Vigna Parrocchiale archaeological area
